title: After 6.21, can't load into game.
body:
After patch 6.21, any time I try to load into a game (custom game, normal game, doesn't matter), I'm met with the black pre-loading screen. Never goes to loading screen, game never loads.

 {{item:3070}} _**Rito pls**_ {{item:3070}} 

Could this have something to do with...

> _We have the technology._
> **WAIT FOR IT** Added a spinning icon in the lower right-hand corner of the loading screen. If it stops moving, that means something went wrong.

HMM?

replies.body: This black screen is commonly a connection problem that's failing to reach the game server, so it can't download any assets.  Give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to get this fixed up!  I'm not sure what that quote box is in reference to, but let me know if you have any questions!
